snippet: The N.H.L. and its players' association failed to communicate for a third straight day Thursday as the league lockout hit the two-month mark, with no new talks scheduled and more game cancellations imminent.
abstract: The N.H.L. and its players' association failed to communicate for a third straight day Thursday as the league lockout hit the two-month mark, with no new talks scheduled and more game cancellations imminent.

headline.main: With Contract Talks Stalled, More Cancellations Are Expected
